description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Justin and Hailey Bieber announce a separation between market creation and December 31, 2026, 11:59PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve immediately upon an announcement of separation from Justin Bieber, Hailey Bieber, or their legal or social media representatives, regardless of if or when the separation actually occurs.

To qualify as an announcement of separation, any announcement must include the term "separate", "separation", or "divorce" in reference to the splitting of the pair, either permanently or temporarily.

The resolution source for this market will be Justin Bieber, Hailey Bieber, or their legal or social media representatives.

events.title: Will Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber separate in 2026?

question: Will Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber separate in 2026?
